All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AsyncPipeline<BEGIN,END>
Represents an asynchronous pipeline that transforms an input of type BEGIN to an output of type END.
AsyncPipeline.Branched<BEGIN,END>
Represents a branched asynchronous pipeline in the Java Pipeline API.
AtomicPipeline<BEGIN,END>
A pipeline that can be atomically replaced.
BasePipeline<BEGIN,END>
Base of a pipeline, which supports the processing of an input element, returning an output element.
MergeablePipeline<BEGIN,END,P,P_END>
Represents a pipeline that can be joined with other pipelines.
OptionalPipeline<BEGIN,END>
Processing pipeline using generics that returns an Optional with the output element or a Optional.empty() if the pipeline is interrupted before reaching the end.
Pipeline<BEGIN,END>
Processing pipeline using generics.
Pipeline.Branched<BEGIN,END>
Represents a branched pipeline in the Java Pipeline API.
Pipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END>
Builder with methods to add stages to the pipeline
Pipeline.Parallel<BEGIN,END>
Represents a parallel pipeline in the Java Pipeline API.
Pipes
A collection of single-step pipelines.
